long_description: The Smith Parallel Max sunglasses feature a performance-driven frame and fit, with large lenses that provide extended coverage while still maintaining a minimalist look and feel. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, injection-molded polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Blue mirror lenses with a gray tint provide true color vision in bright light levels. 53% bio-based Evolve frames are made with Rilsan(R) Clear, a light, durable, non-petroleum-based material derived from renewable, non-GMO castor plants. Hydrophilic Megol nosepiece and temple ends become tackier when wet for reliable grip during exercise and hot weather. The Smith Parallel Max sunglasses have a medium fit with large coverage.
short_description: The Smith Parallel Max sunglasses feature a performance-driven frame and fit, with large lenses that provide extended coverage while still maintaining a minimalist look and feel.
